        public MarketInterfaceTable()
        Constructs the tabular interfaces of the game's market and auction house Displays the market's interface first by default

    • Method Detail

      • switchInterface

        public void switchInterface()
        Switches between showing the market's interface and showing the auction house's interface upon being called Works by clearing the table's contents and then repopulating them with the actors pertaining to the desired interface

      • setMarketButtonFunction

        public void setMarketButtonFunction(ResourceType resource,
                                    boolean buy,
                                    com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.ChangeListener event)
        Method allowing other classes to set the functions of the market interface's various purchasing/selling buttons
        Parameters:
        resource - The type of resource that is to be bought or sold when clicking on the targeted button
        buy - Denotes whether to target the button that buys a particular resource for the active player or the one that would sell it for them instead
        event - Object containing the method to be executed when clicking on the targeted button

      • setAuctionQuantityButtonFunction

        public void setAuctionQuantityButtonFunction(ResourceType resource,
                                             boolean add,
                                             com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.ChangeListener event)
        Method allowing other classes to set the functions of the auction-house interface's various quantity-adjustment buttons
        Parameters:
        resource - The type of resource that is to be varied in the pending trade request through the targeted button
        add - Denotes whether to target the button that reduces the amount of a particular resource to be offered or the one that increases it instead
        event - Object containing the method to be executed when clicking on the targeted button

      • setAuctionPriceButtonFunction

        public void setAuctionPriceButtonFunction(int figures,
                                          boolean add,
                                          com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.ChangeListener event)
        Method allowing other classes to set the functions of the auction-house interface's various price-adjustment buttons
        Parameters:
        figures - The number of digits in the amount of money that the targeted button should vary the pending trade offer's price by [2 denotes values of +/- 10; 3 denotes values of +/- 100; etc.]
        add - Denotes whether to target a button that reduces the amount of money to be offered or one that increases it instead
        event - Object containing the method to be executed when clicking on the targeted button

      • setMarketButtonText

                                boolean buy,
                                java.lang.String text)
        Method allowing other classes to set the labels of the market interface's various price-adjustment buttons
        Parameters:
        resource - The type of resource that is to be bought or sold when clicking on the targeted button
        buy - Denotes whether to target the button that buys a particular resource for the active player or the one that would sell it for them instead
        text - The text to be displayed on the surface of the targeted button

      • setMarketButtonText

        public void setMarketButtonText(ResourceType resource,
                                boolean buy,
                                int price)
        Method allowing other classes to set the labels of the market interface's various price-adjustment buttons
        Parameters:
        resource - The type of resource that is to be bought or sold when clicking on the targeted button
        buy - Denotes whether to target the button that buys a particular resource for the active player or the one that would sell it for them instead
        price - The purchasing/selling cost to be displayed on the surface of the targeted button

        public void toggleMarketButton(ResourceType resource,
                               boolean buy,
                               boolean enabled,
                               com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color color)
        Method allowing other classes to enable or disable the market interface's various price-adjustment buttons
        Parameters:
        resource - The type of resource that is to be bought or sold when clicking on the targeted button
        buy - Denotes whether to target the button that buys a particular resource for the active player or the one that would sell it for them instead
        enabled - Determines whether the targeted button is to be enabled or disabled
        color - Sets the new colour of the targeted button's surface-level label

        color - Sets the new colour of the targeted button's surface-level label

      • refreshPlayers

        public void refreshPlayers(Player[] players,
                           Player currentPlayer)
        Refreshes the list of potential trade-offer recipients that can be examined in the auction-house's interface
        Parameters:
        players - The list of players who are currently playing the game
        currentPlayer - The player that is currently undertaking their turn

      • tradeAmount

        public int tradeAmount(ResourceType resource)
        Returns the amount of a particular resource to be offered in the pending trade request
        Parameters:
        resource - The type of resource to inquire into
        Returns:
        The amount of that resource to be offered in the pending trade request
